title: From the C/D Archives: Toyota MR2 Long-Term Road Test
summary: True success stories are hard to come by. You occasionally hear of such a mundane achievement as a perfect game in baseball, or a prizefighter going undefeated, but truly inspiring tales of accomplishment are few and far between. We therefore counted ourselves fortunate when just such a story unfolded before our eyes. The focus of [â€¦]
